Package antworld.common

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AntAction
    Each AntData contain a reference to an AntAction instance.

    The client tells the server what its ants request to do in the next tick by setting each ant's action to an AntActionType and by setting the parameters required by that action objType.

    The following update form the server will include each of the client's ants with each ant's action types unchanged if that action was successful or set to AntActionType.NOOP if the action failed.
    AntData
    AntData contains all data about an ant that is exchanged between client and server.
    Constants  
    FoodData
    The Class FoodData.

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AntAction.AntActionType  
    AntAction.AntState  
    AntType
    This game supports 3 types of ants: WORKER, EXPLORER and WARRIOR.
    Direction
    To check all directions around a location (x0, y0), use:
    for (Direction dir : Direction.values())
    {
    int x = x0 + dir.deltaX();
    int y = y0 + dir.deltaY();
    }

    Most methods that expect a direction, if given null, will assume the current location is being indicated (deltaX and deltaY == 0).
    GameObject.GameObjectType  
    LandType
    The Enum LandType.
    NestNameEnum
    On the Ant World world map, there are 13 ant nests (things that look like Cheez-ITs).
    TeamNameEnum
